thread.title: RB Leipzig join battle with Liverpool and Bayern Munich for out of contract Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke
thread.title_full: RB Leipzig join battle with Liverpool and Bayern Munich for out of contract Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke

author: Alex Smith
title: RB Leipzig join battle with Liverpool and Bayern Munich for out of contract Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke
text:
Sport RB Leipzig join battle with Liverpool and Bayern Munich for out of contract Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke The youngster is out of contract at the end of the season - and has so far failed to come to an agreement over a new deal Share Solanke to Leipzig? (Photo: Getty Images North America) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
Bundesliga surprise package RB Leipzig have become the latest side to declare an interest in Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke . 
The German club have joined Liverpool and Bayern Munich in their pursuit of the Blues front man. 
Solanke is out of contract at the end of the season - and has so far failed to come to an agreement over a new deal. 
The Premier League side will be keen for Solanke not to join Leipzig, as they would not be able to claim compensation. Solanke's days at Chelsea could be numbered (Photo: AMA/Getty) Solanke has been at Chelsea since 2004 (Photo: REUTERS/Damir Sagolj) 
Instead they would only receive £350,000 - which the Germans see as stunning value. 
If Solanke was to join the Reds, or another English outfit, Antonio Conte would be likely to command an £8m fee. 
Leipzig are currently on course for a Champions League place as they sit second in the German top flight - although they are 13 points behind Bayern. Solanke in action against Thailand All-Stars (Photo: EPA/RUNGROJ YONGRIT) Solanke on England duty (Photo: Rex Features) Read More
